thread.title: Did Kevin McCarthy Quit House Speaker Race After Personal Threat Over Affair Allegations?
thread.title_full: Did Kevin McCarthy Quit House Speaker Race After Personal Threat Over Affair Allegations?

author: Susie Madrak
title: Did Kevin McCarthy Quit House Speaker Race After Personal Threat Over Affair Allegations?
text:
posted on Monica Crowley: The Media Is Out To Destroy Ben Carson Because He’s A Black Conservative lalameda • 54 sec ago 
Dr. Carson. I'm sure someone will let you know shortly that the ONLY words coming out of YOUR mouth that the GOP wants to hear are disrespectful barbs directed at Barack Obama. They will likely give you a list of key words soon, like teleprompter, Muslim, atheist, Kenyan, golf, bare armed wife, vacation, elitist, community organizer, socialist, marxist, communist etc. 
And One more thing. Be very careful using ANY Republican or GOP operative's chart for anything.
